# ShinyRating

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ShinyRating is to allows for easy creating of rating input controls in Shiny.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ShinyRating from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mhanf/ShinyRating")
```
